io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.jsoup.base

Class JsoupBasedSampler<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.base.CachingBasedSampler<T>
      • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.jsoup.base.JsoupBasedSampler<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of sample returned by sampler
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CachingSampler<T>, CanCache, Sampler<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsoupCookieSampler, JsoupDocumentSampler, JsoupResponseCodeSampler

    public abstract class JsoupBasedSampler<T>
extends CachingBasedSampler<T>
    Functionality that helps building Jsoup based samplers.
    Since:
    3.0.0
